name: graph-js
description: graph-js contains the JavaScript and C implementations of the Parsegraph API. The Parsegraph API can be used to render a user-navigable 2D environment of  connected blocks, slots, scenes, sliders, and buds. The JavaScript implementation is contained in an HTML5 canvas and uses a WebGLRenderingContext. The C implementation contains an unfinished window manager-less KMS-based C port of the JavaScript API that can be used from runlevel=3 in the Fedora distro of Linux.
